full_text:
Interesting, Mike.  

I am wondering how it will work...nothing seems to make sense to me 
with any of this, but somehow we are getting responses. LOL  

Yesterday, I thought of your little Listen Up! audio amplifier with the 
Y adapter, headphones and the recorder as an EVP recorder set-up for 
real time audio EVP on investigations.  My plan is to suit-up one of my 
EVP specialists and test in the field within the next couple weeks.  
Perhaps, they might be able to hear the replies as it is being 
recorded, so they can then ask questions.  Interestingly enough, I just 
received an EVP over top of my ghost box sweeping audio on Friday.  
Weird. However, I did not envision the chamber with "prongs"(?) like 
you built, though.  

LOL  Can't wait to hear about your results.

LC
